events.name: EU negotiations for Ukraine's accession
events.wd_description: The European Union has announced that detailed negotiations for Ukraine to join the EU should begin next year, marking a significant milestone in Ukraine's ambitions.
events.description: The European Union has announced that detailed negotiations for Ukraine to join the EU should begin next year, marking a significant milestone in Ukraine's ambitions.

events.name: EU announcement
events.wd_description: The EU Commission recommended that the Council open accession negotiations with Ukraine and Moldova, with talks expected to start next year.
events.description: The EU Commission recommended that the Council open accession negotiations with Ukraine and Moldova, with talks expected to start next year.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky welcomed the Commission's announcement, calling it a historic step for Ukraine and Europe.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky welcomed the Commission's announcement, calling it a historic step for Ukraine and Europe.

events.name: Accession conditions
events.wd_description: Negotiations will not begin until certain conditions have been met, despite the Commission's recommendation.
events.description: Negotiations will not begin until certain conditions have been met, despite the Commission's recommendation.

events.name: Gaza crisis following Hamas attack on Israel
events.wd_label: Gaza crisis following Hamas attack on Israel
events.wd_description: The Gaza Strip has experienced a series of bombardments from Israel following an attack by Hamas militants, leading to a full-blown war.
events.description: The Gaza Strip has experienced a series of bombardments from Israel following an attack by Hamas militants, leading to a full-blown war.

events.name: Bombardments
events.wd_description: Gaza has seen continuous bombardments from Israel as part of the retaliatory attacks against Hamas.
events.description: Gaza has seen continuous bombardments from Israel as part of the retaliatory attacks against Hamas.

events.name: Blockade
events.wd_description: Israel has placed Gaza under a total blockade from food, water, fuel, and electricity supply.
events.description: Israel has placed Gaza under a total blockade from food, water, fuel, and electricity supply.

events.name: Humanitarian crisis
events.wd_description: Gaza is running out of fuel for generators, affecting healthcare facilities and services for over 50,000 pregnant women, and over 1.1 million people have been instructed to move south.
events.description: Gaza is running out of fuel for generators, affecting healthcare facilities and services for over 50,000 pregnant women, and over 1.1 million people have been instructed to move south.

events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: t: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: t: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: t: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: t: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: t: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: t: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: t: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: t: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: Nissan's UK Investment in EV Production
events.wd_label: Nissan's UK Investment in EV Production
events.wd_description: Nissan announced a £1.12 billion ($1.4 billion) investment in its British plant to build electric versions of the Qashqai and Juke, with total investments reaching up to £2 billion ($2.5 billion) including a third battery plant.
events.description: Nissan announced a £1.12 billion ($1.4 billion) investment in its British plant to build electric versions of the Qashqai and Juke, with total investments reaching up to £2 billion ($2.5 billion) including a third battery plant.

events.name: Investment Details
events.wd_description: The investment includes building electric versions of the Qashqai and Juke, a third battery plant, and infrastructure projects in Sunderland.
events.description: The investment includes building electric versions of the Qashqai and Juke, a third battery plant, and infrastructure projects in Sunderland.

events.name: t: Leaf Production Continuation
events.wd_description: Nissan will continue to produce its electric Leaf model in Sunderland with batteries supplied by a small plant at the site.
events.description: Nissan will continue to produce its electric Leaf model in Sunderland with batteries supplied by a small plant at the site.

events.name: t: Previous Investment
events.wd_description: In 2021, Nissan announced a $1.4 billion investment to build a second, 9 GWh battery plant in Sunderland with Chinese partner Envision AESC.
events.description: In 2021, Nissan announced a $1.4 billion investment to build a second, 9 GWh battery plant in Sunderland with Chinese partner Envision AESC.

events.name: Government Support
events.wd_description: The project is expected to receive UK government support, with ongoing discussions about subsidies and guarantees.
events.description: The project is expected to receive UK government support, with ongoing discussions about subsidies and guarantees.

events.name: t: Government Statements
events.wd_description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak emphasized the importance of making the UK the best place to do business and mentioned the support for Nissan's investment.
events.description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak emphasized the importance of making the UK the best place to do business and mentioned the support for Nissan's investment.

events.name: t: Global Investment Summit
events.wd_description: The investment announcement comes ahead of the Global Investment Summit, where Prime Minister Sunak will host Nissan President and CEO Makoto Uchida.
events.description: The investment announcement comes ahead of the Global Investment Summit, where Prime Minister Sunak will host Nissan President and CEO Makoto Uchida.

events.name: Industry Impact
events.wd_description: Nissan's investment will support jobs for 7,000 workers in Sunderland and 30,000 people in the supply chain, contributing to the UK's auto industry.
events.description: Nissan's investment will support jobs for 7,000 workers in Sunderland and 30,000 people in the supply chain, contributing to the UK's auto industry.

events.name: t: Tata Motors Investment
events.wd_description: India’s Tata Motors announced a £4 billion ($5 billion) investment in a UK electric vehicle battery plant to supply its Jaguar Land Rover factories.
events.description: India’s Tata Motors announced a £4 billion ($5 billion) investment in a UK electric vehicle battery plant to supply its Jaguar Land Rover factories.

events.name: t: Future EV Plans
events.wd_description: Nissan plans to offer only fully electric cars in Europe by 2030 and will announce the names of the new EV models and production timings later.
events.description: Nissan plans to offer only fully electric cars in Europe by 2030 and will announce the names of the new EV models and production timings later.
